author: JetMETdqmval
body:
Fix in filling of PFCandidate METPhi histograms: checks before filling, if species is present in the event. Else we have as result an unnatural peak in the METPhi bin at 0. This effect was present in histograms in data in the METPhi histograms for ChargedHadrons since the tracker was not in for the first part of the run.
In addition fix a wrong filling call for histograms with previous empty bunch (or two bunches). This feature would show its effect only in 25 ns runs.
title: apply fix in filling of PFCandidate METPhi histograms
